timeline.bodyText: What kinds of exceptions are possible here? Anything worth logging (even if just at DEBUG level)?
timeline.author: em1

timeline.bodyText: Could we call this npi so no one mistakes it for a constant?
timeline.author: em1

timeline.message: change variable to lower case and add log statement to generateNPI
renamed NPIValidationUtil to NPIUtil and moved generate NPI to NPIUtil
